doc:
Hilton Edwards https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hilton_Edwards 0 Hilton Edwards (2 February 1903 – 18 November 1982) was an English-born Irish actor, lighting designer and theatrical producer. He co-founded the Gate Theatre with his partner Micheal MacLiammóir and has been referred to as the founder of Irish theatre. He was one of the most recognizable figures in the arts in twentieth-century Ireland. Hilton_Edwards ( 2_February_1903 – 18_November_1982 ) was an_English-born_Irish_actor , lighting designer and theatrical_producer . He co-founded the_Gate_Theatre with his_partner_Micheal_MacLiammóir and has_been_referred to as the_founder of Irish_theatre . He was one of the_most_recognizable_figures in the_arts in twentieth-century_Ireland .
